item.title: Alan Cumming Invites Donald Trump to Compete on ‘The Traitors’
item.description: “I’m sure our president would be very good on the show," the host said backstage at the 2025 Emmys.

item.title: Toronto: Brian Cox Trades Logan Roy’s Ruthless Boardroom for the Director’s Chair
item.description: The ‘Succession’ star makes his feature debut behind the camera with ‘Glenrothan,’ a tender, whisky-soaked drama co-starring Alan Cumming, which premieres at TIFF.

item.title: Toronto: Brian Cox Trades Logan Roy’s Ruthless Boardroom for the Director’s Chair
item.description: The ‘Succession’ star makes his feature debut behind the camera with ‘Glenrothan,’ a tender, whisky-soaked drama co-starring Alan Cumming, which premieres at TIFF.

item.title: ‘The Traitors’ Heads to NBC With Civilian Version of Backstabbing Game
item.description: Alan Cumming will continue to host the show, and the celebrity incarnation of the game remains on Peacock.
